data.name: Paramount Hero
data.detailed_description:
Overview

Inspired by multiplayer classics, Paramount Hero is a third-person skill-progression MMO with a fantasy world setting. Kill mobs, collect loot, hone your skills, complete quests, and cooperate with (or kill!) other players to become a legendary hero.

Features

  • 50+ varieties of monsters including unique rare-spawns
  • 20+ quests - and not of the "kill X monsters" variety
  • Dozens of skills and spells
  • Hundreds of items to collect and craft
  • Day/night cycles
  • Dynamically changing weather
  • Summonable pets who will fight for you
  • Interactive and branching quest NPC dialog
  • 3km² main world area, procedurally generated content with hand-crafted points of interest
  • Real-time multi-shard online multiplayer
  • Support for hundreds of players per shard
  • In-game proximity/global chat
  • Situation-based NPC AI
  • Fully server-authoritative / cheat-resistant

data.short_description: Inspired by multiplayer classics, Paramount Hero is a third-person skill-progression MMO with a fantasy world setting. Kill mobs, collect loot, hone your skills, complete quests, and cooperate with (or kill!) other players to become a legendary hero.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.0 ghz Dual-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0 ghz Quad-Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OSX 10.13
  • Processor: 2.0 ghz Dual-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OSX 10.15
  • Processor: 3.0 ghz Quad-Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
